adviseScripts.text: Waterpower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Waterpower, waterpower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text:
Waterpower, waterpower!
Waterpower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Waterpower!
Firepower!
Waterpower, waterpower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Waterpower! Waterpower!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Wanterpower...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I 'waterpower' together for a while.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I think I can finally be reborn as a hybrid.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: From now on, you're gonna be on easy street.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Can a hybrid solve the Ark's energy crisis?
So, in other words, you're an opportunist.
Uh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Um...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I think I've got to train more for that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If you mean I'm someone who grabs an opportunity the moment I see it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Then that's exactly what I am!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I pontificate on the profundity of hybrids.
Huff... Huff... Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I almost fell for Yan's promotional tactics again!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm impressed that you stood your ground.
What did you buy this time?
I know!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I dropped by Yan's shop earlier to buy some watermelon juice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But she told me there was a 10-drink minimum for each order.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: When I refused, she changed her tune and said I only had to buy three,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: and that she'd then give me a conch necklace for free.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: And what did you do?
She said I'd get a free necklace if I bought three cups of juice, so I did.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: In other words, you fell for it.
Nuh-uh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I didn't pay for the conch necklace.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: *Honk*
When Neon blows the conch, a resounding echo booms.
... Well, as long as you're happy.
I watch Neon blow the conch to her heart's content.
I've been wondering...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Why is sea water so salty? It tastes awful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Why are you so hell-bent on drinking it?
Because there are seamounts erupting deep in the ocean depths.
Oh. I don't drink it because I want to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's just that I always end up accidentally swallowing some when I'm swimming in the ocean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: The salt in the rocks melts into the sea, and...
... Fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I talk about some scientific topics with Neon.
I took a catnap on the hammock for a while earlier because I was pooped.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Frima got really upset with me though,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: and demanded to know why I was sleeping on her bed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Aren't hammocks meant to be used by everyone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'll talk to her about it.
But Frima set that up herself, didn't she? And you were off to the side napping.
Ah, well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Actually, I didn't help much when the hammock was being set up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Then why are you mad?
I figured since I didn't have the facts on my side, I had to try and appeal to your sympathy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That doesn't mean she can't share it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: People like you are the reason we can't have nice things.
Hmph!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon is agitated about her nap being interrupted, and I let her sleep on my lap.
There's something I've noticed during our vacation here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm very talented at goofing off.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Anyone can do that.
All right, show me what you've got.
Nuh-uh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Goofing around requires a huge amount of energy and creativity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: This is a unique skill set that not just anyone can master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Hyah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Pfffwaaah! Hyah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I pick up a few pointers on how to goof around from Neon.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What do you think of my swimsuit? Be honest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It's cute.
Very aquatic, and perfectly symmetrical.
Um... Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: How can you tell it's got perfect symmetry if you've only
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: seen me from one side?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That's a very thoughtful answer though, and I appreciate that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I continue to praise Neon's swimsuit for a while.
Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: When you think of fun activities to do by the seaside, what comes to mind first?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Great big fireworks that light up the sky.
Adrenaline-pumping water sports where you zoom across the sea.
Master, I've already told you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I've temporarily cast aside my desire for all things pyrotechnic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Not even the word "fireworks" will make me waver.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Not... one... bit...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: So you like water sports, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: *Splash*
... Drip.
... Drop.
What in the world are you doing?
You said you like water sports, so I thought I'd splash you with some water.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You don't seem too pleased though... I think I should go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon beats a swift retreat.
Master,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I've been pondering something lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If a shark and whale fought, who would win?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: The shark, of course.
The whale, of course.
Right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Sharks are agile, and they have sharp teeth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But what if it were against a killer whale?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: The sheer enormity of a whale is a big advantage, and they're smart.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... But what if it were against a great white shark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It still couldn't beat a killer whale.
I should have known you'd put the question of
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: this royal rumble to rest, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I continue to imagine other battles between marine powerhouses.
You know that beach chair in the coastal clinic?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You think it'd feel cozy if you were to lie there for a long time?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That spot is shaded from the sun, and there's a nice breeze.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Are you planning on malingering?
If you stay there for too long, they'll give you a shot.
What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What an accusation!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I may be pretending to be a patient when I'm not,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: but I'm not faking an illness, necessarily.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I didn't even think about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: In that case, I'll keep my eyes peeled and slink off when it's my turn.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I tell Neon of other nice places where she can avoid the heat.
Could you give me some recommendations
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: for some summer activities I can do with Mary?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Catch a cold and get a shot for it.
Play games that test your courage in the dead of the night.
But Master, it's summer! Not even Volt could catch a cold this time of year.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Besides, you know how much I hate needles.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... there are a lot of ancient structures on this island. You don't think it'd be too scary playing at night?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Then again, it might be fun if Mary's there with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Even a ghost would run away at the sight of Mary holding a syringe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I plan how we'll be spending summer vacation with Mary.
Volt and I have gotten closer recently, and it made me think...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to raise a dog of my own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure that you can handle that responsibility?
Dogs are always the cutest when you don't have to take care of them.
Of course!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Even when you have to go into isolation to hone your waterpower?
Oh. I didn't think of that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for pointing that out, Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I still want to raise one myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Whenever Volt sees Liter while I'm playing with him, he ditches me straight away and runs to her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I show each other photos we took of Volt while conversing.
I collected way too many shells from the beach.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm having a tough time figuring out which ones I like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: How about diving into the sea to look for some?
Oh, there's one by your feet...
What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Then I would be a shell without a soul.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Whoa! This one's shaped like a train! I've never seen anything like that before!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon gives me a crash course on seashell collection.
Master,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I think my waterpower and firepower can work in harmony now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That means I'll be the big cheese amongst the hybrids.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I suppose so.
Everyone knows Brid is the big cheese amongst the hybrids.
Woohoo! Master finally acknowledged me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm gonna go around and tell everyone about this!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Oh, right! Hybrid does sound like "High Brid".
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: When you consider that, Brid's the natural choice to be the head honcho.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I guess I'm doomed to only ascend so high...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I study the fundamentals of the world of hybrids with Neon.
I recently discovered a real conundrum.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If I go into the sea wearing glasses and I get slammed by a rogue wave,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: my glasses will go flying and be swept away. What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Throw your glasses into the water before the wave gets you.
How about wearing goggles instead of glasses?
Nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon takes off her glasses and tosses them into the ocean.
*Plop*
Agh! I can't see!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: How am I going to live now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Let's go. I'll help you find your glasses.
Goggles would definitely be more secure than glasses.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to ask Liter to make me a pair.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I study ways to avoid losing things with Neon.
Master, there's this Nikke.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: She comes across a faucet while walking on the street.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What does she do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Turn it on.
Walk by it.
That's right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If you see a faucet, you crank that baby to the max! It's the most logical course of action.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Faucet, activate! Splash!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Are you trying to upset me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I thought the answer would be painfully obvious to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Together, Neon and I make up a fable about the water nation.
Whenever I'm hanging out at the beach,  I sometimes look up at the clinic,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: and I can't help but notice that the doctors are always staring at you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What could that mean?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: They're spies from Tetra. We should keep our eyes peeled.
... No comment.
You're right. Elysion can't be the only one of the Big Three to plant spies in our midst.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'll be extra vigilant from now on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: You know something, don't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: What is it? What are you keeping from me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm not keeping anything from you.
You say that, but that smile of yours is awfully ambiguous...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: We talk about secret stories related to the doctors in Seraphim.
Master,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: have you got any in-depth knowledge to impart to me today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: No. It's time that you strike out on your own.
Sure, let's take a dip in the ocean.
What? But I only just started learning waterpower from you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure I'm ready to be on my own?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: It sounds to me more like you're trying to shirk responsibility.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Hehe, all right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'm hoping to extend my water gun's range today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: If I can pull that off, I'll consider today's training a success.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Neon as her mentor.
The path of waterpower is such a profound discipline.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I wonder, what is its essence?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: ... Water.
I am waterpower, therefore waterpower is.
I think you may be taking this too literally.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Or am I? Fear not, young grasshopper, you are still new to this world.
Whoa!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: That's like... super-duper profound! And confusing as heck, too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: The next time someone asks me, that's what I'm gonna tell them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I talk to Neon about the essence of waterpower.
Yan and I had some wonderfully refreshing fruit today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Want to taste some?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: We got two kinds. Pick whichever one you want!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I'll take the one that's a bit hairy.
I want the pink mushroom.
Hmm, this one's looking a bit weird, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Neon and I peel the fruit and taste it.
Whoa... whoa! This is delicious!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Let's have some more! No, a lot more!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: I've got some reservations about this one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: But, the Ark is low on resources, so we should do our part and give it a taste.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: We roast the mushrooms and take a few tentative nibbles.
Barf...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neon

adviseScripts.text: Blurgh...
We end up having to visit the clinic for our upset stomachs.
